title.rendered: AFN SIDE STEPS TO SUIT MITSUBISHI TRITON MQ 2015+

content.rendered:
AFN Side Steps to suit Mitsubishi Triton MQ (2015+) available through Automax 4×4!

AFN side steps to suit Mitsubishi Triton MQ include;

  • Steel Tube Design
  • Checkered Aluminum Plate Top
  • Hi-Lift Jack Points
  • Matte Black Powder Coated (Tube ONLY)

In need of more gear for your Mitsubishi Triton? To check out our range, click here!

For more 4×4 inspiration follow us on Instagram and Facebook

excerpt.rendered: AFN side steps to suit your Mitsubishi Triton MQ (models 2015+) are currently available in store or online at Automax 4×4!
